text: Edgar Franklin "Ed" Foreman, Jr. (December 22, 1933 - February 2, 2022) an American politician and motivational speaker. For one term, he was a member of the United States House of Representatives as the only Republican from Texas's 16th congressional district from 1963 to 1965 and again from 1969 to 1971 in New Mexico's 2nd district."Edgar Franklin Foreman", Who's Who in America with World Notables, Vol, 56 (1970-1971), (Chicago: Marquis Who's Who, 1970), p. 747 Foreman died on February 2, 2022 at the age of 88.Former congressman Ed Foreman — who represented southern New Mexico and west Texas — dies at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Ed Foreman
